data.comment: The match is underway in Falmer.
Brighton have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Brighton's Alireza Jahanbakhsh misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 15, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Alexis MacAllister (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 16, In Falmer, Dan Burn (Brighton) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Arsenal at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brighton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Bernardo (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Brighton.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 29, Granit Xhaka of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Martin Atkinson awards Brighton a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 31, Martin Atkinson signals a Brighton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Throw-in for Arsenal at American Express Community Stadium.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Brighton's Alexis MacAllister gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
Davy Propper (Brighton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Falmer Brighton drive forward through Alireza Jahanbakhsh. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Brighton needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 48, Martin Atkinson awards Brighton a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 51, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang breaks free at American Express Community Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 51, Martin Atkinson signals a Arsenal throw-in in Brighton's half.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Gabriel Martinelli for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Arsenal are coming forward and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Martin Atkinson awards Brighton a goal kick.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Arsenal's area.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 59, Lewis Dunk (Brighton) gets a yellow card.
Arsenal's Pablo Mari goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 63, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brighton.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh for Brighton drives towards goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 65, Alireza Jahanbakhsh (Brighton) has received a first yellow card.
Arsenal make their first substitution with Alexandre Lacazette replacing Gabriel Martinelli.
Alexandre Lacazette scores to make it 0-1 at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 66, Great play from Bukayo Saka to set up the goal.
Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a first substitution, with Neal Maupay replacing Alexis MacAllister.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
The home team have replaced Davy Propper with Solly March. This is the second substitution made today by Graham Potter.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Graham Potter is making the team's third substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Leandro Trossard replacing Alireza Jahanbakhsh.
In the minute 76, Martin Atkinson signals a Brighton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bukayo Saka for Arsenal who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 79, Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in Falmer.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal's half?
In the minute 81, Dani Ceballos (Arsenal) has replaced the possibly injured Bukayo Saka.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In Falmer Brighton attack through Joel Veltman. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 86, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Brighton's Joel Veltman gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
In the minute 89, Brighton needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
Ainsley Maitland-Niles is replacing Emile Smith-Rowe for Arsenal at American Express Community Stadium.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Brighton.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in Falmer.
Arsenal are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Brighton just outside Arsenal's area.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
Martin Atkinson blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
